title: Mobile Microlearning Design for IT-Based Science Leadership Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Customized learning focused on enhancing ethical decision-making and technology application competencies in science within BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze ethical dilemma cases in science with 80% accuracy through mobile-based microlearning modules.
Learners can systematically design science data interpretation and decision-making processes in three or more stages using IT tools.
Learners can achieve 85+ points in science leadership scenario-based practical assessments (quiz + simulation) within 72 hours of completing a short-term course.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
